about_the_game:
The 'Deluxe Upgrade Pack' features:

4 Alternate Hero Skins

‘Deluxe’ Profile Customisation Set, a selection of customisation options for your in-game profile, including a unique avatar, avatar frame, banner, and banner image.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content

detailed_description:
The 'Deluxe Upgrade Pack' features:

‘Deluxe’ Profile Customisation Set, a selection of customisation options for your in-game profile, including a unique avatar, avatar frame, banner, and banner image.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (22H2)
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX 5600XT (6GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 27 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For above 30 FPS at 1920 x 1080 with Low settings in all situations.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 Super (8GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT (12GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 27 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For 60 FPS or more at 1920 x 1080 with High settings in most situations.

short_description: The 'Deluxe Upgrade Pack' features: 4 Alternate Hero Skins ‘Deluxe’ Profile Customisation Set, a selection of customisation options for your in-game profile, including a unique avatar, avatar frame, banner, and banner image.
